{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=Orbi Router |revision=(RBR40) |asin=B06XJNDYX8 |newegg=N82E16833122742 |series=AC2200 |est_release_date=3/28/2017 |fcc_date=03/02/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |type=wireless router, wireless system |fcc_id=PY316400362, PY317400404 |pcb_id=2976551502 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019 |cpu1_cspeed=710 MHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |fla2=4 GiB |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;SKY, 2623L, 605EF;;2; ,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR);CSR8811;;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, Bluetooth 4.1, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''866''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac backhaul (433Mbps per stream), :• '''866''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11n device (2.4GHz QAM-256) channel = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Orbi High-Performance AC2200 Tri-Band WiFi Router}} ''802.11ac Two-Stream Wave2 WiFi plus Dedicated Two-Stream Wireless Backhaul'' :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk40.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=rbk40}} "2976551502" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos (OEM [[Delta Networks]]) *Netgear Orbi Kit (RBK30): Orbi Router (RBR40) + Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30) *Netgear Orbi Kit (RBK40): Orbi Router (RBR40) + Orbi Satellite (RBS40) *Netgear Orbi Kit (RBK43): Orbi Router (RBR40) + 2x Orbi Satellite (RBS40) A new FCC entry (PY317400404) dated 02/27/2018 removes bluetooth support. :Setup GUI available at http://orbilogin.com when connected via Wi-Fi. ===Product features=== *Dedicated two stream 802.11ac wireless backhaul *4 GB of flash is claimed by Netgear ===Forum threads=== *[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/275-netgear-orbi-wifi-system-rbk30/ ''NETGEAR Orbi WiFi System (RBK30)'' gallery on '''OpenITforum'''] ===See also=== *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR50)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Router'' • [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/orbi/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Dakota) 2x 2T2R, QCA9984 (Cascade) 4T4R AC *[[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS50)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' • ''Orbi Kit (RBK50)'' :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Dakota) 2x 2T2R, QCA9984 (Cascade) 4T4R AC *[[Netgear Orbi Outdoor Satellite (RBS50Y)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR40)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Router'' • [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/orbi/ PPage] *[[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS40)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' • [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/orbi/ PPage] *[[Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk50.aspx RBK50]) - AC3000 (RBR50 + RBS50) *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk40.aspx RBK40]) - AC2200 (RBR40 + RBS40) *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk30.aspx RBK30]) - AC2200 (RBR40 + RBW30) __NOTOC__
